/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, indicating the city's active life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
